messages.message: This is very (maybe too) finicky, but I think there could be a bit more spacing below the Start Building button, either by moving the design elements up or giving me more room to scroll down. My icon dock is at the bottom of the page (and appears on hover-over), and if I’m not very deliberate, I bring up the dock (which hides the button) when trying to get to the button.
Good callout -- I actually think we should add the keep the bottom bar that has terms of service and privacy policy at the bottom. cc @lydia @Junwon Jang can we add that?

is the idea that the bottom bar would make the page scrollable, which allows the user to scroll lower such that the start building button is higher on the page when scrolled down? i think the easier fix might be to make the illustration slightly smaller so that the button is positioned a little higher on the page
Yeah I’m just thinking something closer to this, slightly smaller image, less space above, more space below (minus the choppy color gradient from copy/pasting)
